mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.report_form_name AS "reportFormNum", a.learning_content AS "learningContent", a.course AS "createBy.phone"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO preview_report_form( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, report_form_name, learning_content, course ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{reportFormNum}, #{learningContent}, #{createBy.phone} )
